body:
Hi

My questions are:  About The Prestige


1.-Prestige is useful?

2.-What is the maximum prestige?

3.-All colors of the prestige?  [Purple, Green...]
body_tagged:
Hi

My questions are:  About The Prestige


1.-Prestige is useful?

2.-What is the maximum prestige?

3.-All colors of the prestige?  [Purple, Green...]
title: About The Prestige

replies.body:
1. Prestige just gives you a lot of sweg/bragging rights.
2. The maximum prestige is 15th
3. Colours are: 1 Pink 2 Lime 3 Blue 4 Red 5 Yellow 6 Dark Green 7 Dark Blue That's all I know :C

This topic should help. > Here <

replies.body:
1. You get a smexy star
2. Max is 15th
3. Pink, lime, light blue, red, yellow, green, blue, purple, gray, black, yellow sun, orange sun, blue snowflake, green snowflake, black sea urchin.

Edit: thanks xxMasterPro

replies.body: Just like JKawesome said, you get an extremely sexy star.
replies.body_tagged: Just like JKawesome said, you get an extremely sexy star.

replies.body:
The prestige symbol basically signifies that you play that game mode frequently, or at least enough to have gotten to Level 50 however many times. It gives you, well... prestige. You know — higher status, respect, a reputation. "Hacker! Oh, never mind, you have seventh prestige." Generally, people with rarer prestige symbols are more skillful and well-known on the server. And to complete JK's list, I believe (only 95% sure) that thirteenth and fourteenth are blue and green snowflakes, respectively. "Black sea urchin", lol...

Edit: No problem.

replies.body: Ok, speaking bluntly, NO, the prestiges have no real use. They just show a sign of dedication and skill.
